mapper.select: select p.code from sys_permissions p left join sys_role_permissions rp on rp.permissions_id = p.id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rp.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and p.status = #{status} and p.code != ''
select r.code from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and r.status = #{status} and r.code != ''
select r.id from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and r.status = #{status} and r.code != ''
select r.name from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and r.status = #{status} and r.code != ''

select p.path,p.target,p.target,p.hide,p.component,p.name,p.id,p.icon,p.p_id,p.order_no from sys_permissions p left join sys_role_permissions rp on rp.permissions_id = p.id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rp.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and p.status = #{status} and p.type = #{type} group by p.path,p.component,p.name,p.id,p.icon,p.p_id,p.order_no order by p.order_no
